title: Riot threatens to cancel the entire League of Legends summer season in North America if a deal with players isn't made
description: The LCS Players Association voted in favor of a walkout, so now Riot is playing hardball.

title: AI industry begs someone to please stop the AI industry before all human life is extinguished by the AI industry
description: More than 300 researchers and industry leaders signed their names to a new statement warning of a potential extinction event.

title: Start your tiny engines, a Hot Wheels Unleashed sequel is on the way
description: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged will release this fall with new cars, courses, and abilities.

title: Stardew Valley's developer tweeted 'iridium scythe' and everyone is losing it
description: Finally the scythe might get promoted to hang out with the cool tools.

title: Diablo 4 dev corrects day 1 patch statement, says the launch version will have 'very few' changes from the Server Slam build when it goes live
description: Associate director Joseph Piepiora had previously said the full release of Diablo 4 would be significantly changed from the Server Slam version.

title: Activision Blizzard CEO audaciously claims that sexism and harassment problems were made up by an 'aggressive labor movement' trying to 'destabilize the company'
description: Bobby Kotick said in a new interview that there was never any "systemic issue with harassment" at his company.

title: This lo-fi, PS1-style horror is like a campy Saw escape room, and I'm definitely getting the bad ending
description: The Tartarus Key has a hell of a look, some great puzzles, and a tone that occasionally grates.

title: Diablo 4 Legendary Aspect locations guide
description: Bolster your build with these powerful bonuses.

title: Play a city builder above ground and Dungeon Keeper below simultaneously in this brilliantly creative game
description: Just when you think you've got SteamWorld Build figured out, it unfolds another new layer to manage.

title: Hideo Kojima says Metal Gear Solid 2 had to make 300 changes and was almost cancelled in the wake of the September 11 terrorist attacks
description: A sequence where a Metal Gear attacked New York was almost completely removed.

title: Witcher 3 director and Cyberpunk producer launch a new studio: 'After working for years in an increasingly conservative industry, we’re ready to make bold, impactful projects'
description: Blank, as the new outfit is known, is working on a new game "set in an apocalypse, with a twist."

title: Intel could match TSMC for chip transistor density later this year
description: Intel might even be beating TSMC by 2024.

title: AMD joins in the AI war with on-chip inferencing demo
description: Whatever Intel can do, AMD can claim to do better.

title: Immortals of Aveum hands-on: If boomer shooters are '90s, does that make this a Gen-X shooter?
description: Confusing genre shorthand aside, the spirit of the 2008 singleplayer shooter is alive in this wizard FPS.

title: Putin orders creation of annual esports 'cyberchampionship,' where CS:GO is banned because of 'one-sided coverage of political events'
description: The contest seems to be being handled by ex-Wargaming subsidiary Lesta Games.

title: Strong Bad’s Cool Game For Attractive People is becoming Strong Bad's Abandonware For Licensing Reasons
description: The 2008 adventure game was written by the show's creators.

title: Ex-BioWare dev says no-one there believes in 'BioWare magic', Anthem 2 'was really fun, but that is when EA canned it'
description: "During development, management was putting in gating mechanics to 'lengthen' the time it took to complete the story".

title: Wage psychological warfare behind enemy lines in this XCOM-like World War 2 turn-based strategy game
description: Classified: France '44 tells the story of Allied special forces working with the French Resistance to fight back against Nazi occupation.

title: Konami is officially doing the most boring thing possible with the MGS3 remake's voice acting
description: Metal Gear Solid Delta will use the original game's voice track with no alterations.

title: The perfect PSU for your silent gaming PC build just became a reality
description: The "near-absolute silence" Cooler Master X Silent power supply is available in a completely fanless 750W model.

title: The Diablo 4 community is printing t-shirts, baking cakes, and buying chicken on other continents in advance of the game's launch
description: Are you guys okay?

title: Fractal Design's gorgeous new Terra PC case vindicates my disdain of the cyberpunk aesthetic
description: More PC cases should be designed with the Scandi aesthetic in mind, if you ask me.

title: Gigabyte's RTX 4090 Gaming Box wants to turn your ultrabook into an absolute monster of a gaming PC
description: Thunderbolt 3 and 850W, but the price is probably going to be scary.

title: I'm so ready for flat-packed PC cases
description: And not a moment too soon; our case cupboard can't take much more.

title: Yeah, I spent my time at Computex stroking a $600 DIY Ducky keyboard, what of it?
description: The Ducky ProjectD Outlaw is made with some seriously high-end materials, just like a Mercedes Benz. Apparently.

title: The HyperX Cloud III would be a superb mid-range gaming headset pick if the best weren't so cheap
description: The Cloud III looks great, feels great, and offers a good audio experience. Only thing is HyperX and Razer's best are the same price or cheaper.

title: A $4 tweak to Noctua's AMD Ryzen cooler bracket lowers CPU temperatures by up to 3ºC
description: The new offset bracket will be on all new coolers as standard later this year, but you can upgrade your existing cooler for just $4 from June.

title: I didn't know I need a gaming chair with a wiggly backrest but now I've tried it, it makes so much sense
description: Having experienced the wonders of the ThunderX3 Core's Lumbar 360 backrest, I'm questioning why it's taken this long to invent

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #711: Wednesday, May 31
description: Today's Wordle: Help with the #711 puzzle.
